content.description: Memory system now supports unified conversation tracking across email, SMS, and voice
features: Automatic phone number extraction from SMS gateway emails
Identity linking between email addresses and phone numbers
Unified conversation context across all mediums
Conversation history merging when identities are linked

implementation_details.phone_normalization: Converts all phone formats to 10-digit format
implementation_details.auto_linking: Detects phone numbers in email addresses like 1234567890@vtext.com
